casebody.data:
COMMSCOPE CREDIT UNION
v.
BUTLER AND BURKE, LLP, et al. No. 5PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 2, 2015. Alfred P. Carlton, Jr., Raleigh, for Commscope Credit Union. L. Oliver Noble, Jr., Hickory, for Commscope Credit Union. Michael Joseph Barnett, Hickory, for Commscope Credit Union. Frederick K. Sharpless, Greensboro, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Christopher Carlisle Lam, Charlotte, for Graham, Barry D., et al. Camden R. Webb, Raleigh, for Pope, Todd, et al. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Michael W. Mitchell, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Lauren H. Bradley, Raleigh, for NCACPA, AICPA, and Center for Audit Quality. Brent Powell, Winston-Salem, for Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. C. Mark Wiley, Winston-Salem, for Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. Michael R. Cashin, Winston-Salem, for Cherry Bekaert LLP, et al. Mel J. Garofalo, Charlotte, for N.C. Chamber. Noel L. Allen, Raleigh, for National Association of State Boards of Accountancy. Nathan E. Standley, for National Association of State Boards of Accountancy. Ashley E. Eiler, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Richard A. Simpson, for Butler & Burke, LLP. Brian D. Boone, Charlotte, for Chamber of Commerce of the USA. Ian S. Richardson, for Commscope Credit Union.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of September 2015 by Plaintiff to Withdraw Motion to Remove:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of September 2015."
